title: What are the lyrics of the Mahiya song by Ranjit Bawa? - Quora

response.answer_text: Mahiya song by Ranjit Bawa Ajj Tak Meri Maa Ne Mainu Hon Na Ditta Parayi Chali Ajj Ghar Shoryan De Vekh Ke Akh Bhar Aayi Chali Ajj Ghar Shoryan De Vekh Ke Akh Bhar Aayi Hanjua Naal Challi Vekhi Hanjua Naal Challi Vekhi Munkh Dhoyi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Baabul Di Dhee Ajj Maa Ae Baabul Di Dhee Ajj Maa Ae Baabul Di Dhee Ajj Maa Ae Dekh Ho Challi Begaani Saambh Layi Guddiyan Pattole Mere Bachpan Di Nishani Saambh Layi Guddiyan Pattole Mere Bachpan Di Nishani Choti Meri Bahan Mere Naal Choti Meri Bahan Mere Naal Haan Gusse Hoyi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Addeya Ve Oh Aavo Ni Aavo Ni Laavo Shagna Di Mehndi Aavo Ni Aavo Ni Laavo Shagna Di Mehndi Dhee’Aan Mutiyaran Hoiyaan Khunja Ton Daaran Hoiyaan Baabul Mere Nu Addiyon Neend Na Paindi Aavo Ni Aavo Ni Laavo Shagna Di Mehndi Aavo Ni Aavo Ni Laavo Shagna Di Mehndi Veer Ne Rakhni Meri Da Kaisa Mull Paaya Ae Veer Ne Rakhni Meri Da Kaisa Mull Paaya Ae Wo Changa Ghar Sohna Maahi Haan Jide Naal Laaya Ae Wo Changa Ghar Sohna Maahi Haan Jide Naal Laaya Ae Gal Lagg Ke Ro Lain De Gal Lagg Ke Ro Lain De Ve Jind Moyi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve Rakdi Jo Sunne Kade Vi Rakdi Jo Sunne Kade Vi Haan Rakdi Jo Sunne Kade Vi Gutt Naa Haye Rehan Na Paa Tibbi Wala Lavi Kahe Har Ek Nu Devin Behan Rabba Tibbi Wala Lavi Kahe Har Ek Nu Devin Behan Rabba Roke Te Na Rukdi Na Ve Roke Te Na Rukdi Na Ve Ankh Choyi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Addeya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Ve Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Addeya Ve Maa Royi Jaandi Aa Thoda Cheer Khad Ja Mahiya Ve

Ajj tak meri maa ne mainu Hon na ditta paraayi Challi ajj ghar saureyan de Vekh ke akh bhar aayi Challi ajj ghar saureyan de Vekh ke akh bhar aayi Hanjuan naal challi vekhi Hanjuan naal challi vekhi Mukh dhoyi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya Ve maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya Ve maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya ve Baabul di thi ajj maaye Baabul di thi ajj maaye Baabul di thi ajj maaye Dekh ho challi beghani Saambh layi guddiyan patole Mere bachpan di nishani Saambh layi guddiyan patole Mere bachpan di nishani Chhoti meri behan mere naal Chhoti meri behan mere naal Haan gusse hoyi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya Ve maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja addeya ve Ho aavo ni aavo ni laavo Shagna di mehndi Aavo ni aavo ni laavo Shagna di mehndi Dheeyan mutiyaran hoiyan Khoonja to daaran hoiyan Baabul mere nu addiyo Neend na paindi Aavo ni aavo ni laavo Shagna di mehndi Aavo ni aavo ni laavo Shagna di mehndi Veer ne rakhni meri da Kaisa mull paaya ae Veer ne rakhni meri da Kaisa mull paaya ae Ho changa ghar sohna maahi Haan jihde naal laaya ae Ho changa ghar sohna maahi Haan jihde naal laaya ae Gal lag ke ro lain de Gal lag ke ro lain de Ve jind moyi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya Ve maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya ve Rakhdi jo sunne kade vi Rakhdi jo sunne kade vi Haan rakhdi jo sunne kade vi Gutt na haye rehn rabba Ho Tibbi wala Lavi kahe har Ek nu devi behn rabba Ho Tibbi wala Lavi kahe har Ek nu devi behn rabba Roke te rukdi na ve Roke te rukdi na ve Akh choyi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja addeya Maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja addeya Ve maa royi jaandi aa Thoda chir khad ja mahiya ve
